Description: Welcome to your newly renovated two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment on Physicians Row in the South End! This unit features a brighter space, new kitchen and bath, and free washer/dryer. Enjoy the outdoors on your own roof deck. The updated bathroom and kitchen with dishwasher make this unit a fabulous one-bedroom with an office. You'll love the convenience of living in this vibrant neighborhood with easy access to restaurants, shops, and more. Don't miss out on this opportunity to upgrade your lifestyle!
